sentences.sContent: She sprawled on the bed as he had left her, not even moving to cover herself up.
sentences.sCn: 他离开她后，她摊开四肢躺在床上，甚至懒得动动把自己盖上。

synos.tran: 蔓延；伸开手足躺；无计划地扩展
蔓生；伸开手足躺卧姿势

phrases.pCn: 城市扩张；都市向郊区扩张的现象

remMethod.val: 伸展手脚趴(sprawl)在地上潦草地写(scrawl)

trans.tranOther: If you sprawl somewhere, you sit or lie down with your legs and arms spread out in a careless way

trans.tranCn: 扩展， 蔓延； 蔓延物
